ids_info.name: sawteeth
ids_info.description: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode

sawteeth/vacuum_toroidal_field.documentation: Characteristics of the vacuum toroidal field (used in rho_tor definition). Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode.

sawteeth/vacuum_toroidal_field/r0.documentation: Reference major radius where the vacuum toroidal magnetic field is given (usually a fixed position such as the middle of the vessel at the equatorial midplane). Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within vacuum_toroidal_field container: Characteristics of the vacuum toroidal field (used in rho_tor definition).

sawteeth/vacuum_toroidal_field/b0.documentation: Vacuum toroidal field at R0 [T]; Positive sign means anti-clockwise when viewing from above. The product R0B0 must be consistent with the b_tor_vacuum_r field of the tf IDS. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within vacuum_toroidal_field container: Characteristics of the vacuum toroidal field (used in rho_tor definition).

sawteeth/crash_trigger.documentation: Flag indicating whether a crash condition has been satisfied : 0 = no crash. N(>0) = crash triggered due to condition N as follows. 1: crash triggered by the ideal kink criterion; 2: crash triggered by the ideal kink criterion including kinetic effects from fast particles; 31: crash triggered by the resistive kink criterion (meeting necessary conditions for reconnection); 32: crash triggered by the resistive kink criterion (resistive kink mode is unstable). The distinction between 31 and 32 only indicates whether (31) or (32) was the last criterion to be satisfied. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode.

sawteeth/profiles_1d.documentation: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/grid.documentation: Radial grid. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/grid/rho_tor_norm.documentation: Normalized toroidal flux coordinate. The normalizing value for rho_tor_norm, is the toroidal flux coordinate at the equilibrium boundary (LCFS or 99.x % of the LCFS in case of a fixed boundary equilibium calculation, see time_slice/boundary/b_flux_pol_norm in the equilibrium IDS). Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices. Within grid container: Radial grid.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/grid/rho_tor.documentation: Toroidal flux coordinate = sqrt(phi/(pi*b0)), where the toroidal magnetic field, b0, corresponds to that stored in vacuum_toroidal_field/b0 and pi can be found in the IMAS constants. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices. Within grid container: Radial grid.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/grid/rho_pol_norm.documentation: Normalized poloidal flux coordinate = sqrt((psi(rho)-psi(magnetic_axis)) / (psi(LCFS)-psi(magnetic_axis))). Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices. Within grid container: Radial grid.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/grid/psi.documentation: Poloidal magnetic flux. Integral of magnetic field passing through a contour defined by the intersection of a flux surface passing through the point of interest and a Z=constant plane. If the integration surface is flat, the surface normal vector is in the increasing vertical coordinate direction, Z, namely upwards. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices. Within grid container: Radial grid.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/grid/volume.documentation: Volume enclosed inside the magnetic surface. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices. Within grid container: Radial grid.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/grid/area.documentation: Cross-sectional area of the flux surface. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices. Within grid container: Radial grid.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/grid/surface.documentation: Surface area of the toroidal flux surface. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices. Within grid container: Radial grid.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/grid/psi_magnetic_a.documentation: Value of the poloidal magnetic flux at the magnetic axis (useful to normalize the psi array values when the radial grid doesn't go from the magnetic axis to the plasma boundary). Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices. Within grid container: Radial grid.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/grid/psi_boundary.documentation: Value of the poloidal magnetic flux at the plasma boundary (useful to normalize the psi array values when the radial grid doesn't go from the magnetic axis to the plasma boundary). Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices. Within grid container: Radial grid.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/t_e.documentation: Electron temperature. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/t_i_average.documentation: Ion temperature (averaged on charge states and ion species). Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/n_e.documentation: Electron density (thermal+non-thermal). Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/n_e_fast.documentation: Density of fast (non-thermal) electrons. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/n_i_total_over_n_e.documentation: Ratio of total ion density (sum over species and charge states) over electron density. (thermal+non-thermal). Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/momentum_phi.documentation: Total plasma toroidal momentum, summed over ion species and electrons. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/zeff.documentation: Effective charge. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/p_e.documentation: Electron pressure. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/p_e_fast_perpendicu.documentation: Fast (non-thermal) electron perpendicular pressure. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/p_e_fast_parallel.documentation: Fast (non-thermal) electron parallel pressure. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/p_i_total.documentation: Total ion pressure (sum over the ion species). Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/p_i_total_fast_perp.documentation: Fast (non-thermal) total ion (sum over the ion species) perpendicular pressure. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/p_i_total_fast_para.documentation: Fast (non-thermal) total ion (sum over the ion species) parallel pressure. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/pressure_thermal.documentation: Thermal pressure (electrons+ions). Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/pressure_perpendicu.documentation: Total perpendicular pressure (electrons+ions, thermal+non-thermal). Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/pressure_parallel.documentation: Total parallel pressure (electrons+ions, thermal+non-thermal). Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/j_total.documentation: Total parallel current density = average(jtot.B) / B0, where B0 = Core_Profiles/Vacuum_Toroidal_Field/ B0. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/j_phi.documentation: Total toroidal current density = average(j_phi/R) / average(1/R). Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/j_ohmic.documentation: Ohmic parallel current density = average(J_Ohmic.B) / B0, where B0 = Core_Profiles/Vacuum_Toroidal_Field/ B0. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/j_non_inductive.documentation: Non-inductive (includes bootstrap) parallel current density = average(jni.B) / B0, where B0 = Core_Profiles/Vacuum_Toroidal_Field/ B0. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/j_bootstrap.documentation: Bootstrap current density = average(J_Bootstrap.B) / B0, where B0 = Core_Profiles/Vacuum_Toroidal_Field/ B0. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/conductivity_parall.documentation: Parallel conductivity. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/e_field_parallel.documentation: Parallel electric field = average(E.B) / B0, where Core_Profiles/Vacuum_Toroidal_Field/ B0. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/q.documentation: Safety factor. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/magnetic_shear.documentation: Magnetic shear, defined as rho_tor/q . dq/drho_tor. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/phi.documentation: Toroidal flux. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/psi_star_pre_crash.documentation: Psi* = psi - phi, just before the sawtooth crash. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/psi_star_post_crash.documentation: Psi* = psi - phi, after the sawtooth crash. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices.

sawteeth/profiles_1d/time.documentation: Time. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within profiles_1d container: Core profiles after sawtooth crash for various time slices.

sawteeth/diagnostics.documentation: Detailed information about the sawtooth characteristics. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode.

sawteeth/diagnostics/magnetic_shear_q1.documentation: Magnetic shear at surface q = 1, defined as rho_tor/q . dq/drho_tor. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within diagnostics container: Detailed information about the sawtooth characteristics.

sawteeth/diagnostics/rho_tor_norm_q1.documentation: Normalized toroidal flux coordinate at surface q = 1. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within diagnostics container: Detailed information about the sawtooth characteristics.

sawteeth/diagnostics/rho_tor_norm_invers.documentation: Normalized toroidal flux coordinate at inversion radius. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within diagnostics container: Detailed information about the sawtooth characteristics.

sawteeth/diagnostics/rho_tor_norm_mixing.documentation: Normalized toroidal flux coordinate at mixing radius. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within diagnostics container: Detailed information about the sawtooth characteristics.

sawteeth/diagnostics/previous_crash_trig.documentation: Previous crash trigger. Flag indicating whether a crash condition has been satisfied : 0 = no crash. N(>0) = crash triggered due to condition N. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within diagnostics container: Detailed information about the sawtooth characteristics.

sawteeth/diagnostics/previous_crash_time.documentation: Time at which the previous sawtooth crash occured. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within diagnostics container: Detailed information about the sawtooth characteristics.

sawteeth/diagnostics/previous_period.documentation: Previous sawtooth period. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode. Within diagnostics container: Detailed information about the sawtooth characteristics.

sawteeth/time.documentation: Generic time. Within sawteeth IDS: Description of sawtooth events. This IDS must be used in homogeneous_time = 1 mode.
